trans-unit.source: Defines the basic functionality that represents the personalization data for a page.
trans-unit.target: Define la funcionalidad básica que representa los datos de personalización para una página.

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from this base class contain the actual implementation for managing, applying, and extracting personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Las clases que derivan de esta clase base contienen la implementación real para administrar, aplicar y extraer datos de personalización.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> class makes use of personalization state with a reference to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> clase hace uso de estado de personalización con una referencia a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState>.

trans-unit.source: If a developer writes a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> implementation, a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider> must also be written.
trans-unit.target: Si un programador escribe un personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> implementación, un personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider> debe escribirse también.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider> instances are responsible for creating and consuming <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> instances.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationProvider> instancias son responsables de crear y consumir <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> instancias.

trans-unit.source: Derived classes should always call the base class constructor from the derived constructor.
trans-unit.target: Las clases derivadas siempre deben llamar al constructor de clase base desde el constructor derivado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> that manages Web Parts controls that have personalization data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> que administra controles de elementos Web que tienen datos de personalización.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState" />.

trans-unit.source: The object created by this constructor manages the state for Web Parts controls that are managed by the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: El objeto creado por este constructor administra el estado para los controles de elementos Web que se administran según los valores especificados <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="webPartManager" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El parámetro <paramref name="webPartManager" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Derived classes should always call the base class constructor from the derived constructor.
trans-unit.target: Las clases derivadas siempre deben llamar al constructor de clase base desde el constructor derivado.

trans-unit.source: When overridden, applies personalization data to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control associated with the personalization state instance.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se reemplaza, aplica los datos de personalización al control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> asociado a la instancia de estado de personalización.

trans-unit.source: The associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control was a parameter in the constructor that created the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> object.
trans-unit.target: El asociado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control era un parámetro en el constructor que creó el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control to which personalization data is applied.
trans-unit.target: Control de elementos Web al que se aplican los datos de personalización.

trans-unit.source: When overridden, applies personalization data to the specified Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se reemplaza, aplica los datos de personalización al control de elementos Web especificado.

trans-unit.source: This is the abstract definition of the method used to apply personalization data to a Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Ésta es la definición abstracta del método utilizado para aplicar datos de personalización a un control de elementos Web.

trans-unit.source: When overridden, extracts personalization information from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control associated with the current personalization state.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se reemplaza, extrae información de personalización del control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> asociado al estado de personalización actual.

trans-unit.source: This is the abstract definition of a method used to extract personalization information from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> object.
trans-unit.target: Esta es la definición abstracta de un método utilizado para extraer información de personalización de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control está asociado el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> was a parameter in the constructor that was used to create the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> object.
trans-unit.target: El asociado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> era un parámetro en el constructor que se usó para crear la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control from which personalization data is extracted.
trans-unit.target: Control de elementos Web del que se extraen los datos de personalización.

trans-unit.source: When overridden, extracts personalization data from the specified Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se reemplaza, extrae los datos de personalización del control de elementos Web especificado.

trans-unit.source: This is the abstract definition of the method used to extract personalization data from a Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Ésta es la definición abstracta del método utilizado para extraer datos de personalización de un control de elementos Web.

trans-unit.source: The ID of the Web Parts control from which the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter" /> is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: El Id. del control de elementos Web del que se recupera el <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter" />.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the authorization filter for the specified Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Recupera el filtro de autorización para el control de elementos Web especificado.

trans-unit.source: The authorization filter string for a Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Cadena de filtro de autorización para un control de elementos Web.

trans-unit.source: This method returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> string for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control before an instance of it is created.
trans-unit.target: Este método devuelve el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> de cadena de un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controlar antes de que se crea una instancia del mismo.

trans-unit.source: This method should return `null` if there is no personalized value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Este método debe devolver `null` si no hay ningún valor personalizado para el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set does not implement any default behavior for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: El conjunto de controles de elementos Web no implementa ningún comportamiento predeterminado para el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AuthorizationFilter%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: The property is provided so that a developer can assign an arbitrary string value to a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control; this property can be checked by subscribing to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart> event on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control on a page to determine whether the control can be added to the page.
trans-unit.target: La propiedad se proporciona para que un desarrollador puede asignar un valor de cadena arbitrario a un personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control; Esto puede propiedad comprobará si se suscribe a la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.AuthorizeWebPart> evento en el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control de una página para determinar si el control puede agregarse a la página.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether any personalization information has changed.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si alguna información de personalización ha cambiado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if any personalization state instance has changed (is "dirty"); otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si alguna instancia de estado de personalización ha cambiado; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> class checks this property to determine whether the personalization state needs to be written back to the underlying data store.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> clase comprueba esta propiedad para determinar si el estado de personalización debe escribirse de nuevo en el almacén de datos subyacente.

trans-unit.source: When overridden, gets a value that indicates whether any personalization state was extracted by a state instance.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se reemplaza, obtiene un valor que indica si una instancia de estado extrajo algún estado de personalización.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if any personalization state was extracted by a state instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si una instancia de estado extrajo algún estado de personalización; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is an abstract definition of a property that can be called to determine whether any personalization state was extracted by a state instance.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad es una definición abstracta de una propiedad que se puede llamar para determinar si una instancia de estado extrajo algún estado de personalización.

trans-unit.source: Marks the current personalization state as having changed.
trans-unit.target: Indica que el estado de personalización actual ha cambiado.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> can use this method to mark themselves as having changed (or being "dirty"), thus indicating the need to reserialize and save personalization state.
trans-unit.target: Las clases que heredan de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> puede usar este método para marcarse a sí mismas como modificado (o que se va a "sucio"), lo que indica la necesidad de serializar y guardar el estado de personalización.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control to be marked as having changed.
trans-unit.target: Control de elementos Web que se va a marcar como modificado.

trans-unit.source: When overridden, marks a Web Parts control as having changed.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se reemplaza, marca un control de elementos Web como modificado.

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract definition of the method used to indicate that a Web Parts control has changed (is "dirty").
trans-unit.target: Se trata de una definición abstracta del método utilizado para indicar que un control de elementos Web ha cambiado (está "sucio").

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class exposes methods (which in turn call this method) that can be used by developers to mark a Web Parts control as "dirty," thus indicating the need to reserialize and save personalization state.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> clase expone métodos (que a su vez llama a este método) que los desarrolladores pueden usar para marcar un control de elementos Web como "modificados", lo que indica la necesidad de serializar y guardar el estado de personalización.

trans-unit.source: When overridden, marks the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control as having changed.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se reemplaza, marca el control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> asociado como modificado.

trans-unit.source: This is the abstract definition of the method used to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> instance associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> instance is now considered to have changed (is "dirty").
trans-unit.target: Ésta es la definición abstracta del método utilizado para indicar que la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> instancia asociada con el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> ahora se considera que han cambiado (está "sucio").

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> class exposes a protected method (which in turn calls this method) that can be used by developers to mark the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control as "dirty," thus indicating the need to reserialize and save personalization state.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> clase expone un método protegido (que a su vez llama a este método) que los desarrolladores pueden usar para marcar asociado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control como "modificados", lo que indica la necesidad de serializar y guardar el estado de personalización.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control to be validated.
trans-unit.target: Control de elementos Web que se va a validar.

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the specified Web Parts control is valid.
trans-unit.target: Comprueba si el control de elementos Web especificado es válido.

trans-unit.source: This method verifies that `webPart` is a valid Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: Este método comprueba que `webPart` es un control de elementos Web válido.

trans-unit.source: The base class verifies that `webPart` is not `null` and is managed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> object.
trans-unit.target: La clase base comprueba que `webPart` no es `null` y esté administrado por el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control está asociado el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> should validate Web Parts controls inside of any methods that work with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> instances.
trans-unit.target: Las clases que derivan de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> debe validar los controles de elementos Web dentro de los métodos que operan con <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> instancias.

trans-unit.source: This ensures that standalone <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> instances do not have state changes accidentally written into the personalization data for a page.
trans-unit.target: Esto garantiza que independiente <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> instancias no tiene cambios de estado accidentalmente escritos en los datos de personalización de una página.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="webPart" /> is not currently managed by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="webPart" /> no es administrado actualmente por el administrador <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> asociado al estado <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="webPart" /> is <see langword="null." />
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="webPart" /> es <see langword="null." />

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control currently associated with the personalization state instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene una referencia al control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> actualmente asociado con la instancia de estado de personalización.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> asociado al <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control is the object used as a parameter for the constructor that creates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> object.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control es el objeto que se utiliza como parámetro para el constructor que crea el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState> objeto.
